title: 11/25: Weekend Recap - Melvin Gordon Noooooo!!! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Reacting to Melvin Gordon's knee injury and what it could mean for Austin Ekeler before we discuss some better news like the performances of top Waiver Wire guys (2:10) such as Jameis Winston, Gus Edwards, Josh Adams and DJ Moore ... Winners (7:35) including Adam Humphries and David Njoku and losers (9:15) including two universally-owned WRs who continue to disappoint. We've also got more news items to know (15:55), Buy or Sell (17:24) with SEA WRs, LeSean McCoy, Larry Fitzgerald and more, plus a look at the leaderboard at each position (20:26). Has Baker Mayfield arrived? Is Rob Gronkowski a stud again? ... Recapping each game with our Fantasy thoughts (30:10) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: From Melvin Gordon to Jameis Winston to Gus Edwards and so much more, we've got everything you need to know from Week 12.
